trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Sidney
There were no other sightings in Sidney on or around March 9th 2012
Summary: Red and white lights in row inner 4 white pulsed in pairs left to right.
divs: Sighting Details Wife got home from work at midnight and we looked for northern lights when we saw object.It seemed very large and at a high altitude traveling in a straight line East to West.It appeared to be like a wing or the lights were in a straight line.No sound was observed.The inner white lights strobed in pairs back and forth.The duration of the sighting was approximately 2 minutes.
